ticker: Join us for live DJs mixing every Saturday night!
Follow us on Bluesky for all event announcements!

event.top: Warm up and dance at the
ticker: Check out our new wall art around the station! Some old 1.0 favs return and new pieces by Flightlessbird3!
We are now on the nicer website! Use the new button on the station concourse and follow us @bassstationvr.bsky.social
The Christmas countdown stars tomorrow! Check back next week for a festive update!

performers.name: ttofu
ticker: Please welcome our first new DJ of the night! They're setting off to both Uptempo and Rawtempo!

performers.name: A.V.E.S. Protocol
ticker: Express service to Hardstyle and friends

performers.name: ARGENT
ticker: Welcome our second new DJ of the night! They're taking us to Psytrance!

performers.name: V[AI]RUS
ticker: Our final service, ending up at Frenchcore... probably.
Follow V[AI]RUS on Bluesky @vairus.bsky.social and Twitter @v_ai_rus

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This event terminates here. We wish you the best with your onward musical journey!
Passengers are reminded to remain hydrated at all times and shower the DJ with good vibes and your emotes at frequent intervals.
We're now on Bluesky! Follow us @bassstationvr.bsky.social
Please welcome our two new DJs playing tonight!
